Uses of Class
blackjack.logiikka.Betting

  • Packages that use Betting 
    Package Description
    blackjack.guilogiikka  

    • Uses of Betting in blackjack.guilogiikka

      Methods in blackjack.guilogiikka with parameters of type Betting 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UicBetting.askForInsurance(Player p, Betting b, JFrame frame)
      Method creates dialog in which player decides if player wants insurance.
      void UicBetting.betMore(Betting b, int amount, Player p)
      Method increased bet by amount and takes money from player's money.
      String UicConclusion.checkWinnerAndPayWins(Player p, Player c, Betting b)
      Method checks for winner, makes pays and return result of game.
      void UicBetting.clearBet(Betting b, Player p)
      Method sets bet to zero and adds money to player's total money.
      void UicBetting.doubleBet(Betting b, Player p)
      Method removes money from player and doubles bet after that.
      int UicBetting.getBet(Betting b)
      Method returns current bet.
      void UicConclusion.payWins(Player p, Player c, Betting b)
      Method adds wins to player depending of result of the game.
      void UicBetting.setBetToZero(Betting b)
      Method only sets bet to zero.
      void UicDealing.startBetting(Player p1, Player p2, Dealer d, Betting b)
      Method clears hands, sets position counter to zero and shuffles deck 3 times.
